<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

## IDataStoreORM interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

This is the default query interface for the credential data stored by a Veramo agent.

Plugins implementing this interface are expected to implement this simple query functionality to filter the data that was saved using [IDataStore](./core.idatastore.md).

If this interface is implemented by a different plugin than [IDataStore](./core.idatastore.md), then both plugins MUST use the same media for data storage.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IDataStoreORM extends IPluginMethodMap
```

<b>Extends:</b> [IPluginMethodMap](./core.ipluginmethodmap.md)

## Methods

| Method                                                                                                                                        | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [dataStoreORMGetIdentifiers(args, context)](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetidentifiers.md)                                               | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Tries to obtain a list of [IIdentifiers](./core.iidentifier.md) that match the given filter. The origin of these identifiers is from any credential / presentation or message that was successfully processed by this agent.</p><p>If the same database is used for implementations of [AbstractDIDStore](./did-manager.abstractdidstore.md), then these identifiers can also come from [didManagerCreate](./core.ididmanager.didmanagercreate.md) or [didManagerImport](./core.ididmanager.didmanagerimport.md) operations.</p>  |
| [dataStoreORMGetIdentifiersCount(args, context)](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetidentifierscount.md)                                     | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Tries to obtain a count of [IIdentifiers](./core.iidentifier.md) that match the given filter. The origin of these identifiers is from any credential / presentation or message that was successfully processed by this agent.</p><p>If the same database is used for implementations of [AbstractDIDStore](./did-manager.abstractdidstore.md), then these identifiers can also come from [didManagerCreate](./core.ididmanager.didmanagercreate.md) or [didManagerImport](./core.ididmanager.didmanagerimport.md) operations.</p> |
| [dataStoreORMGetMessages(args, context)](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetmessages.md)                                                     | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns a list of [IMessage](./core.imessage.md)s that match the given filter. These are messages that were stored using [dataStoreSaveMessage](./core.idatastore.datastoresavemessage.md).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [dataStoreORMGetMessagesCount(args, context)](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetmessagescount.md)                                           | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns a count of [IMessage](./core.imessage.md)s that match the given filter. These are messages that were stored using [dataStoreSaveMessage](./core.idatastore.datastoresavemessage.md).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [dataStoreORMGetVerifiableCredentials(args, context)](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetverifiablecredentials.md)                           | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns a list of [UniqueVerifiableCredential](./core.uniqueverifiablecredential.md)s that match the given filter based on the top level properties of a credential.</p><p>These are VerifiableCredentials that were stored using [dataStoreSaveVerifiableCredential](./core.idatastore.datastoresaveverifiablecredential.md).</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [dataStoreORMGetVerifiableCredentialsByClaims(args, context)](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetverifiablecredentialsbyclaims.md)           | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns a list of [UniqueVerifiableCredential](./core.uniqueverifiablecredential.md)s that match the given filter based on the claims they contain.</p><p>These are VerifiableCredentials that were stored using [dataStoreSaveVerifiableCredential](./core.idatastore.datastoresaveverifiablecredential.md).</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [dataStoreORMGetVerifiableCredentialsByClaimsCount(args, context)](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetverifiablecredentialsbyclaimscount.md) | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns a count of [UniqueVerifiableCredential](./core.uniqueverifiablecredential.md)s that match the given filter based on the claims they contain.</p><p>These are VerifiableCredentials that were stored using [dataStoreSaveVerifiableCredential](./core.idatastore.datastoresaveverifiablecredential.md).</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [dataStoreORMGetVerifiableCredentialsCount(args, context)](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetverifiablecredentialscount.md)                 | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns a count of [UniqueVerifiableCredential](./core.uniqueverifiablecredential.md)s that match the given filter based on the top level properties of a credential.</p><p>These are VerifiableCredentials that were stored using [dataStoreSaveVerifiableCredential](./core.idatastore.datastoresaveverifiablecredential.md).</p>                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [dataStoreORMGetVerifiablePresentations(args, context)](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetverifiablepresentations.md)                       | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns a list of [UniqueVerifiablePresentation](./core.uniqueverifiablepresentation.md)s that match the given filter based on the top level properties of a presentation.</p><p>These are [VerifiablePresentation](./core.verifiablepresentation.md)s that were stored using [dataStoreSaveVerifiablePresentation](./core.idatastore.datastoresaveverifiablepresentation.md).</p>                                                                                                                                                |
| [dataStoreORMGetVerifiablePresentationsCount(args, context)](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetverifiablepresentationscount.md)             | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns a count of [UniqueVerifiablePresentation](./core.uniqueverifiablepresentation.md)s that match the given filter based on the top level properties of a presentation.</p><p>These are [VerifiablePresentation](./core.verifiablepresentation.md)s that were stored using [dataStoreSaveVerifiablePresentation](./core.idatastore.datastoresaveverifiablepresentation.md).</p>                                                                                                                                               |
